text: Location of the state of Nevada in the United States of America This is a list of symbols of the U.S. state of Nevada. The majority of the items in the list are officially recognized symbols created by an act of the Nevada Legislature and signed into law by the governor. ==Miscellaneous== {| class="wikitable" |- ! width="20%" | Type !
